Chittagong has been a seaport since ancient times.
The most popular natural wonders of Chittagong are cox's bazaar, Saint Martin Island, Bandarban, Naval Beach and Rangamati.
There are more places that you may not want to miss the chance to visit whenever you get.
Those are Bhatiary hill, Meghla, Sitakunda Eco park, dula hajara safari park, foys lake, himchori, inani.
Some of the places are given here with the guidelines.
 Wish you a happy trip to chittagong.

 - Iffatun Nessa and Fahmina Kabir Developers of Radiant Chittagong (app)
